answers.answer: Blood urine, definitely need to let your Dr knows know

question: Can you have tiny specks of blood when wiping after urinating..  I think I may have a urine infection as its a Lill stinging like pressure like I haven't finished when I'm done I've had lots of urine infection in the past was even under  urology for it but since I've been pregnant I've never had an infection which is weird cos I thought being pregnant would make me more at risk,  anyway the infections I've had before never had tiny specks of blood so could this be coming from else where down there I do feel rather sore as well..  I'm 30+6days  but baby is big weighing 5lbs as I have gestational diabetes so will be induced early
title: is it an infection .....
